23class kalmanFilter
24{
25 typedef common::measurement measurement;
26 //System model
27 //Xt = A*xt-1 + Bt*Ut + epsilon
28 //Sensor model
29 // Yk = HkXk + Vk
30 // x = { xpos,ypos, xdot,ydot}
31 public:
32 kalmanFilter();
33 ~kalmanFilter();

54 void prediction();

62 std::string name_;

65};
66// p(x) is a gaussian
67// p(x) = det(2*pi*Σ)^(-1/2)*exp(-1/2*(x-µ)^T*Σ^-1*(x-µ))
68// p(x) basicallly composed of mean µ and covariance Σ.
69// Posterior(Prediction), given Ut and Xt-1
70// p(xt|ut,xt-1) = det(2*pi*Rt)^-1/2 *
71// exp(-1/2(Xt-AtXt-1-BtUt)^T*Rt^-1*(-1/2(Xt-AtXt-1-BtUt)^)
72// Zt = Ct*Xt + εt1
73// P(Zt | xt) = det(2*pi*Qt)^(-1/2)*
74// exp(-1/2(Zt-Ct*Xt)^T*Qt^-1*(Zt-Ct*Xt))
75};
76#endif
